intro.header: Hi my name is, Evan St Pierre
intro.caption: I am a recent Computer Science graduate actively seeking job opportunities.

hobbies.description: When I’m not coding, you’ll probably find me out cycling or running. I love exploring new places and enjoying a good cup of coffee—preferably a pour-over. I’m a proud Toronto local and a passionate fan of the Maple Leafs and Blue Jays.

jobs.title: Software Developer Intern | MarshMclennan
jobs.description: Led morning scrum. Developed test for COVID-19 check-in application and built frontend component for the finance portal.

contact.description: Let’s grab a coffee! I love meeting new people and chatting about anything—especially tech, travel, or the Blue Jays.
